workshoptitle: Create and Publish a Mobile Application in Oracle Visual Builder

tutorials.title: Introduction
tutorials.description: The Introduction is always second. The title and contents menu title match for the Introduction.

tutorials.title: Get Started
tutorials.description: This is the prerequisites for customers using Free Trial and Paid tenancies, and Always Free accounts (if applicable). The title of the lab and the Contents Menu title (the title above) match for Prerequisite lab. This lab is always first.

tutorials.title: Lab 3: Create pages to display your data
Lab 4: Add data to your mobile app
Lab 5: Add pages to interact with your data
Lab 6: Configure your mobile app to run as a PWA
Lab 7: Create a build to install your mobile app on Android devices
Lab 8: Create a build to install your mobile app on iOS devices
Lab 9: Build your mobile app for installation on Android and iOS devices
Need Help?
tutorials.description: Solutions to Common Problems and Directions for Receiving Live Help
